Shea Molloy
is interested in technology, art, activism and the environment. She holds a Masters of Science in Data Visualization and a Futures Studies Certificate from Parsons at The New School and is currently working on the Adobe Stock Design Elements Content Team.

Reach out for data and design collaborations, to request tech support for artists, or just to say hello[at]sheamolloy[dot]info
